daos

Class GiftDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • daos.DAO
      • daos.GiftDAO

  • public class GiftDAO
extends DAO
    The GiftDAO class provides access to the gift table in the database.
    Version:
    1.0 04 Apr 2020
    Author:
    Brian Goh

    • Method Detail

      • sendGift

        public boolean sendGift(User sender,
                        User receiver,
                        Crop crop)
        Sends a gift to another user by updating the thread and gift tables
        Parameters:
        sender - user who sends the gift
        receiver - user who receives the gift
        crop - crop that the gift contains
        Returns:
        true upon successful sending, false otherwise

      • getGiftCropName

        public java.lang.String getGiftCropName(java.lang.String senderUsername,
                                        java.util.Date timeStamp)
        Returns crop name of crop stored in a gift
        Parameters:
        senderUsername - username of user who sent the gift
        timeStamp - timestamp that gift is sent
        Returns:
        crop name of crop, null if gift does not exist

      • acceptGifts

        public java.util.Map<Crop,java.lang.Integer> acceptGifts(User user)
        Accepts all gifts received by a user
        Parameters:
        user - user that is accepting gifts
        Returns:
        map storing types and number of crops received

      • haveSentFiveGiftsToday

        public boolean haveSentFiveGiftsToday(User sender)
        Checks if user has already sent five gifts today
        Parameters:
        sender - user to check
        Returns:
        true if user has sent five gifts today, false otherwise

      • haveSentGiftToThisUserToday

        public boolean haveSentGiftToThisUserToday(User sender,
                                           User receiver)
        Check if sender user has already sent a gift to receiver user today
        Parameters:
        sender - gift sender user
        receiver - gift receiver user
        Returns:
        true if sender already sent gift to receiver today, false otherwise
